sentences.english: If I'd done everything they say I've done, she'd have gouged my eyes out.
sentences.chinese: 如果真如检查官所言，她会把我的眼珠挖出来。

sentences.english: Today, Dr. LI Xiangning and Wilfrield visited two store houses in Zhenru, Putuo.
sentences.chinese: 今天，李翔宁与石思平等走访真如副中心的两个仓库。

sentences.english: The world of love, whether the dream without a trace?
sentences.chinese: 人间的恩爱，是否真如春梦了无痕？

sentences.english: If this was the case, what do you think such an act?
sentences.chinese: 如果真如他们所言，你有什么看法？

sentences.english: Is silence an attribute of the real?
sentences.chinese: 沉默可是真如性质之一？

sentences.english: Grant us the grace of true brotherhood.
sentences.chinese: 赐我们真如亲兄弟一般的恩典。

sentences.english: Thankfully, however, our God is not really like the master in this parable.
sentences.chinese: 然而，幸好我们的神并非真如这比喻中的主人那样。

definition: to turn out to be true/verified/true
to expect/to presume/to think (sth is likely)
really/as expected/sure enough/if indeed.../if it's really...
lit. wind from an empty cave (idiom)/fig. unfounded (story)/baseless (claim)
